body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
/kind bug
/sig network

**What happened**:
While debugging failing kube-proxy downgrade test, found node downgrade itself doesn't work.

For downgrade (https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-e2e-gci-gce-latest-downgrade-kube-proxy-ds/72?log#log/):
```
I0905 20:21:51.004] Sep  5 20:21:51.002: INFO: Running /workspace/kubernetes/cluster/gce/upgrade.sh [-N v1.7.6-beta.0.8+ce630cdb7759f2]
I0905 20:21:51.076] == Pre-Upgrade Node OS and Kubelet Versions ==
I0905 20:21:51.337] name: "bootstrap-e2e-master", osImage: "Container-Optimized OS from Google", kubeletVersion: "v1.9.0-alpha.0.309+2f543f321d20ee"
I0905 20:21:51.338] name: "bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-4nzm", osImage: "Container-Optimized OS from Google", kubeletVersion: "v1.9.0-alpha.0.309+2f543f321d20ee"
I0905 20:21:51.338] name: "bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-pxc4", osImage: "Container-Optimized OS from Google", kubeletVersion: "v1.9.0-alpha.0.309+2f543f321d20ee"
I0905 20:21:51.338] name: "bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-x732", osImage: "Container-Optimized OS from Google", kubeletVersion: "v1.9.0-alpha.0.309+2f543f321d20ee"
I0905 20:21:51.346] Project: k8s-jkns-e2e-protobuf
I0905 20:21:51.347] Network Project: k8s-jkns-e2e-protobuf
I0905 20:21:51.347] Zone: us-central1-f
I0905 20:21:53.326] INSTANCE_GROUPS=bootstrap-e2e-minion-group
I0905 20:21:53.327] NODE_NAMES=bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-4nzm bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-pxc4 bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-x732
I0905 20:21:53.512] == Preparing node upgrade (to v1.7.6-beta.0.8+ce630cdb7759f2). ==
I0905 20:21:53.513] == Ensuring that new Node base OS image matched the existing Node base OS image
I0905 20:21:54.726] Warning: Permanently added 'compute.5384938094279703532' (RSA) to the list of known hosts.
I0905 20:21:56.097] == Upgrading node environment variables. ==
I0905 20:21:57.293] /workspace/kubernetes/cluster/gce/../../cluster/../cluster/gce/util.sh: line 601: SUBNETWORK: unbound variable
I0905 20:21:57.294] Attempt 1 to create bootstrap-e2e-minion-template-v1-7-6-beta-0-8-ce630cdb7759f2
I0905 20:21:57.795] WARNING: You have selected a disk size of under [200GB]. This may result in poor I/O performance. For more information, see: https://developers.google.com/compute/docs/disks#performance.
I0905 20:22:05.690] Created [https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/k8s-jkns-e2e-protobuf/global/instanceTemplates/bootstrap-e2e-minion-template-v1-7-6-beta-0-8-ce630cdb7759f2].
I0905 20:22:05.855] NAME                                                          MACHINE_TYPE   PREEMPTIBLE  CREATION_TIMESTAMP
I0905 20:22:05.856] bootstrap-e2e-minion-template-v1-7-6-beta-0-8-ce630cdb7759f2  n1-standard-2               2017-09-05T13:21:58.848-07:00
I0905 20:22:05.909] Instance template name: bootstrap-e2e-minion-template-v1-7-6-beta-0-8-ce630cdb7759f2
I0905 20:22:05.909] == Finished preparing node upgrade (to v1.7.6-beta.0.8+ce630cdb7759f2). ==
I0905 20:22:05.909] == Upgrading nodes to v1.7.6-beta.0.8+ce630cdb7759f2 with max parallelism of 1. ==
I0905 20:22:08.418] == FAILED to set-instance-template for bootstrap-e2e-minion-group to bootstrap-e2e-minion-template-v1-7-6-beta-0-8-ce630cdb7759f2 ==
I0905 20:22:08.419] ERROR: (gcloud.compute.instance-groups.managed.set-instance-template) Could not fetch resource:
I0905 20:22:08.419]  - Invalid resource usage: 'Networks specified in InstanceTemplate must be the same as already set on Instance Group Manager. Expected: projects/k8s-jkns-e2e-protobuf/global/networks/bootstrap-e2e Actual: projects/k8s-jkns-e2e-protobuf/global/networks/default'.
I0905 20:22:08.423] Sep  5 20:22:08.420: INFO: Unexpected error occurred: error running /workspace/kubernetes/cluster/gce/upgrade.sh [-N v1.7.6-beta.0.8+ce630cdb7759f2]; got error exit status 1, stdout "== Pre-Upgrade Node OS and Kubelet Versions ==\nname: \"bootstrap-e2e-master\", osImage: \"Container-Optimized OS from Google\", kubeletVersion: \"v1.9.0-alpha.0.309+2f543f321d20ee\"\nname: \"bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-4nzm\", osImage: \"Container-Optimized OS from Google\", kubeletVersion: \"v1.9.0-alpha.0.309+2f543f321d20ee\"\nname: \"bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-pxc4\", osImage: \"Container-Optimized OS from Google\", kubeletVersion: \"v1.9.0-alpha.0.309+2f543f321d20ee\"\nname: \"bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-x732\", osImage: \"Container-Optimized OS from Google\", kubeletVersion: \"v1.9.0-alpha.0.309+2f543f321d20ee\"\n== Ensuring that new Node base OS image matched the existing Node base OS image\n== Upgrading node environment variables. ==\nInstance template name: bootstrap-e2e-minion-template-v1-7-6-beta-0-8-ce630cdb7759f2\n== FAILED to set-instance-template for bootstrap-e2e-minion-group to bootstrap-e2e-minion-template-v1-7-6-beta-0-8-ce630cdb7759f2 ==\nERROR: (gcloud.compute.instance-groups.managed.set-instance-template) Could not fetch resource:\n - Invalid resource usage: 'Networks specified in InstanceTemplate must be the same as already set on Instance Group Manager. Expected: projects/k8s-jkns-e2e-protobuf/global/networks/bootstrap-e2e Actual: projects/k8s-jkns-e2e-protobuf/global/networks/default'.\n", stderr "Project: k8s-jkns-e2e-protobuf\nNetwork Project: k8s-jkns-e2e-protobuf\nZone: us-central1-f\nINSTANCE_GROUPS=bootstrap-e2e-minion-group\nNODE_NAMES=bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-4nzm bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-pxc4 bootstrap-e2e-minion-group-x732\n== Preparing node upgrade (to v1.7.6-beta.0.8+ce630cdb7759f2). ==\nWarning: Permanently added 'compute.5384938094279703532' (RSA) to the list of known hosts.\r\n/workspace/kubernetes/cluster/gce/../../cluster/../cluster/gce/util.sh: line 601: SUBNETWORK: unbound variable\nAttempt 1 to create bootstrap-e2e-minion-template-v1-7-6-beta-0-8-ce630cdb7759f2\nWARNING: You have selected a disk size of under [200GB]. This may result in poor I/O performance. For more information, see: https://developers.google.com/compute/docs/disks#performance.\nCreated [https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/k8s-jkns-e2e-protobuf/global/instanceTemplates/bootstrap-e2e-minion-template-v1-7-6-beta-0-8-ce630cdb7759f2].\nNAME                                                          MACHINE_TYPE   PREEMPTIBLE  CREATION_TIMESTAMP\nbootstrap-e2e-minion-template-v1-7-6-beta-0-8-ce630cdb7759f2  n1-standard-2               2017-09-05T13:21:58.848-07:00\n== Finished preparing node upgrade (to v1.7.6-beta.0.8+ce630cdb7759f2). ==\n== Upgrading nodes to v1.7.6-beta.0.8+ce630cdb7759f2 with max parallelism of 1. ==\n"
```
Specifically:
```
cluster/gce/util.sh: line 601: SUBNETWORK: unbound variable
```

Seems to be introduced by https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/51739.

@nicksardo @bowei

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Network.
labels.name: sig/network

title: cluster/gce/upgrade.sh failed: "SUBNETWORK: unbound variable"
